mapper.update: update connect_from set destination_city = #{destinationCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, arrive_city = #{arriveCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where origin_city = #{originCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select origin_city, destination_city, arrive_city, state, date, notes from connect_from
